dialogue: Should I have? I felt a great disturbance in the Force... as ...                   Stretch out with your feelings. Now, let's see if we can't figure out what you... He's me...                        That boy is our last hope.                  Don't worry, he'll be all right.                        That's your uncle talking.                     So was I, if you'll remember.                  Even Yoda cannot see their fate. The Organa household was high-born and politic...

And my friends out in it.           I've got a very bad feeling about this.       Good morning. Nice of you guys to  drop by.                                             Yeah. It's your imagination, kid. Come on. Let's kee...              Yeah, but this time I got the money.                                        I'm sorry.                           Can't get out that way. Good, I hate long waits.                      Chewie? Chewie, is that you? You. Listen to you -- you sound like a busines... Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way ...                    Get behind me!  Get behind me! It isn't friendly, whatever it is. Come on, Ch...                       Chewie, get us out of here! Okay, that's it. Try it...Off! Turn it  off! T... Not a bad bit of rescuing, huh?  You know, som...                                            Where?     Jabba, I'll pay you because it's my pleasure.         All right, Chewie, let's get out of here! Seventeen thousand!  Those guys must really be...                                          Why not?         I can't hold them off forever!  Now what?          Chewie! Chewie, this won't help me. Hey!                Well, look at you, a general, huh?                                        Hey!  Hey!                        Well, what would you like?                      Here's where the fun begins! Save your strength. There'll be another time. ... Even I get boarded sometimes.  Do you think I ...                         Yeah, you're a real hero.         Do you know where Commander Skywalker is?                                       Be careful. Well, who says they didn't.  But I ain't crazy...                        Then I'll see you in hell!                              Where are you going?                                      Over to you?  Our position is correct, except... no, Alderaan!           Looks like we're coming up on Alderaan.                                 What do you want?                                  Turn her around.                Don't worry, she'll hold together.                                 We're in trouble! We're a little rushed, so if you'll hurry aboa...                                         You, too. Still, she's got a lot of spirit.  I don't kno... It's possible? Why don't you go find out? It's...                          Boy you said it, Chewie.                                             Luke?

Hold it! Whoa!                               That was too close. So you see, since we're a small operation, we ... Split up and head back to the surface. See if ... How you doing, you old pirate? So good to see ... We've got to be able to get some kind of a rea... Only the fighters are attacking.  I wonder wha... Don't worry, my friends are down there. Let's go.                    Everyone's invited, of course.                              All wings report in.                                         Lower it!

And what precisely am I supposed to know?                                   I'll cover you.    Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.                   We don't need any of your help.        I promise I won't hurt you. Now come here.                                           Thanks. We have powerful friends. You're gonna regret ...                          Then I'm going with you. This is some rescue.  When you came in here, d... Somebody has to save our skins.  Into the garb...                                       Cut it out!                                             What?                                          Mynocks?          You don't have to do this to impress me. Occasionally  maybe...when you aren't  acting ...          So you're part of the mining guild then? The sooner the better. Something's wrong here....                 Ben Kenobi is here!  Where is he?                                     I don't know.                  Just...images, really. Feelings.             You certainly have a way with people.                                   Are you crazy?!                                              Yes.                                   What about Han?                  I'd just as soon kiss a Wookiee. He's got to follow his own path.  No one can c... Don't just stand there.  Try and brace it with...                                       Not really.          With the rest of the garbage. Then what? Quick, we've got to get across.  Find the cont...                  Luke, Luke, grab a hold of this. That doesn't sound too hard.  Besides, they le...                                     I'll be back.

Well, I'm sorry.                                         You, too. Well, not unless you can alter time, speed up ...                           Well, let's get moving!                               Yes. It's you Leia. Look, I'm sure it's delicious. I just don't un... Shut down all the garbage mashers on the deten...                          Father, please. Help me.                                 Dagobah system... Search your feelings, father. You can't do thi... You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me ... Ten thousand?  We could almost buy our own shi... Obi-Wan Kenobi?  I wonder if he means old Ben ...                                              Han!                     And that is why I have to go.               Oh, no. We'll never get it out now.                                     But he can...                        There's still good in him.     Don't worry, Artoo. We're going, we're going.                                        You won't.                    Hang on, Biggs, I'm coming in. Wait, there's something dead ahead on the scan... Why don't you outrun them?  I thought you said... How far away is Yoda? Will it take us long to ...             Blast it, will you!  My gun's jammed.                               Yeah, take it away.                                Artoo -- that way!                  All right, boys, keep tight now.                                          Come on! But I need your help. I've come back to comple...                             Red Five standing by.                        Hobbie, you still with me? The Academy didn't change you much... but you'... Will you forget it?  I already tried it.  It's...  Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.                       You serve your master well.

Oh, I'm terribly sorry. I...I didn't mean to i... Sir, I'm almost afraid to ask, but...does that...                             Lock the door, Artoo. What is what?!? I couldn't possibly...
